channel.title: me on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in me on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: about me
item.description: current assistant professor of statistics Econometric Institute, Erasmus School of Economics, Erasmus University Rotterdam past research fellow of statistics Department of Law and Economics, UnitelmaSapienza University of Rome education dutch university teaching qualification (BKO) Risbo - Erasmus University Rotterdam (2022) phd in methodological statistics at La Sapienza University of Rome (2020) msc in statistics and decision sciences at La Sapienza University of Rome (2016) bsc in statistics at La Sapienza University of Rome (2013) awards and grants research grant for junior researcher “Avvio alla ricerca” (2017) award in Stats under the Stars (an Italian Statistical Society competition): best report (2017) phd scholarishp (3 years) at La Sapienza University of Rome (2016) academic services session organizer and chair of CMStatistics 2023: 16th International Conference of the ERCIM WG on Computational and Methodological Statistics (2023) session organizer of CLADAG 2023 (2023) programme committee member of CLADAG 2023 (2023) programme committee member of IES 2023 (2023) session organizer of SIS 2023: the 52nd Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (2023) responsible for the Sustainability topic within SVQS (2022) session organizer and chair of CMStatistics 2022: 15th International Conference of the ERCIM WG on Computational and Methodological Statistics (2022) co-organizer for the Econometrics internal seminars at Econometric Institute, Erasmus University Rotterdam (2022) session organizer of ECDA 2022: European Conference on Data Analysis (2022) programme committee member of HackTheGene (2022) committee member of Premio TStat Training (2022) national coordinator (2022) and member of the national board of young SIS (2021-2022) programme committee member of SIS 2022: the 51st Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (2022) programme committee member of the conference IES 2022: Innovation and Society 5.
